mapper.select: SELECT SUM(hit), CASE WHEN id = 'S' then '쇼핑' WHEN id = 's' then '쇼핑' WHEN id = 'c' then '클래스' WHEN id = 'C' then '클래스' WHEN id = 'FREE' then '게시판' ELSE ' ' END AS ID FROM hitTable WHERE ID IN ('S', 'c', 'C', 's', 'FREE') AND dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + '7' GROUP BY ID
